section.title: The Mac Installation procedure
section.p: For further information see the FAQ

section.title: Missing Sync for Windows Mobile
section.p: Makr/Space sells a number of add on applications to Macintosh to allow you to connect many types of organisers, including Missing Sync for Windows Mobile.

Once connected, you can install a CAB file (download the CAB file for your organiser) by clicking on the "Install..." button. Select the CAB file, wait for the upload (it is VERY slow, takes more than 10 minutes just for the application, even longer for the data) and follow the instructions on the organiser screen.

section.title: Other choices for installation
section.p: If anyone has other sync or connection software for the pocket pc to macintosh, please contact someone on our lists. Thanks.
